name: node-server-ui-base
description: Coupled daemon and UI with bundled deploy scripts
author: Cameron Tacklind <cameron@tacklind.com>

scripts.setup: yarn install && yarn daemon install && yarn deploy install && yarn ui install && install-vscode-extensions
scripts.synchronize-workspace: yarn --non-interactive --no-progress && yarn daemon --non-interactive --no-progress && yarn deploy --non-interactive --no-progress && yarn ui --non-interactive --no-progress && install-vscode-extensions
scripts.upgrade-all: yarn upgrade --latest && yarn daemon upgrade --latest && yarn deploy upgrade --latest && yarn ui upgrade --latest
